title: Stack Gets Stuck
instructions: Work with a partner and follow the instructions.
tasks: 1) Notice some useful chunks in these sentences.

3) The phrases are from a true story, listed in a random order. Can you guess what happened? Drag and drop to reorder them. Share your story with another group or the class.
